page.title: 07E.Horsley S. Church 1
page.content: St.Martin's Anglican Church celebrates its 950th anniversary in September 1986. Planning for this is well ad- vanced & includes a Thanksgiving Service when the Bishop of Guildford will preach, concerts & plays by local societies, a flower festival & exhibi- tion by children on the theme of St. Martin. In 1982 the N. transept was extended to seat 80. New kneelers were designed & worked by parishioners whose names are listed in a commemora- tive book. Outside the church is the 1914/18 War Memorial & a plaque on the lych gate names those who died in the 1939/45 war. Tea towels with a picture of the church are on sale & there is a stewardship scheme in operation,where- by parishioners covenant to help fin- ance work of the parish. The church- yard has many memorials incl. tombs of the Lovelace family of Horsley Towers.
